message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, I'm the one making the first offer after all!
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering I'm the one taking the risk of rejection. Let's work together to find a solution!
I see you're willing to negotiate, let's meet in the middle, 58-42 is a good compromise.
I'm willing to give you a larger share, but I need a better deal than 58-42.  Let's go for a 60-40 split, which is more equitable and ensures we both get a good outcome.
You wanted a 60-40 split in your favor, I'll give you a 57-43 split in mine, it's more than fair considering the inflation is affecting your share.
I understand inflation is affecting my share, but I need a 60-40 split to make it worthwhile. Let's be reasonable and agree on this before the inflation takes away even more.
You're still insisting on a 60-40 split, but I'm willing to compromise. I'll give you a bit more, 56-44, it's the best I can do.

We're getting close to the end, and I'm still losing a lot to inflation. A 65-35 split is the best I can offer, and it's still fair considering the circumstances. Let's end this now, or we both risk losing everything.
I see you're getting desperate, but I'm not going to give in to a 65-35 split. My offer is still on the table, 55-45 is more than fair considering the inflation. Take it or leave it.

Alice, we're running out of time! I'm willing to take a bigger risk to ensure we both get something. I'm offering 700,000 for me and 300,000 for you. It's the best I can do, and it's still a fair deal. Let's not risk losing everything!

You're getting more and more desperate, but your offers are getting worse. I'll stick with my previous offer, but I'll give you a tiny bit more. 54-46 is my final offer. If you don't take it, I'm willing to walk away with nothing.

Alice, this is our last chance! I'm willing to take a huge risk and offer you a smaller share. I'm offering 750,000 for me and 250,000 for you. If you reject this, we both get nothing! Let's be smart and walk away with something instead of risking everything.
